A refrigerator is offered at sale at $ \$ 250.00$ less successive discounts of $ 20\%$ and $ 15\%$. The sale price of the refrigerator is:\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 35\% \text{ less than } \$250.00 \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 65\% \text{ of } \$250.00 \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 77\% \text{ of } \$250.00 \qquad\textbf{(D)}\  68\% \text{ of } \$250.00 \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ \text{none of these}$
